column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been wanting to come to common bond for years
column2: but finally came here recently! I think the venue deserves the credit it gets! The line was kinda long
column3: and I saw I could place the order online
column4: but I really wanted to see the whole line and pastry assortment. I got the ham and cheese sandwich
column5: we got a few assorted pastries and croissants (best in the city in my opinion)
column6: and my wife got the egg scramble. We loved everything we got
column7: and will definitely come by here again in the short future! The parking was a bit atrocious
column9: literally enough spots to fill maybe a third of the restaurant
column10: the rest is park at your own risk / run across the street if you're brave enough.
